title-part.text: INDEXING SCHEME RELATING TO HINGES OR OTHER SUSPENSION DEVICES FOR DOORS, WINDOWS OR WINGS AND DEVICES FOR MOVING WINGS INTO OPEN OR CLOSED POSITION, CHECKS FOR WINGS AND WING FITTINGS NOT OTHERWISE PROVIDED FOR, CONCERNED WITH THE FUNCTIONING OF THE WING

characterised by the type of motion

reference.text: devices for fastening or securing constructional elements or machine parts together, e.g. nails, bolts, in general F16B

title-part.text: Details, accessories and auxiliary operations not otherwise provided for
Back driving the transmission or motor
applicable on combinations of fixed and movable wings
the wings being coplanar when the movable wing is in the closed position
on different wing or frame locations
on the left or right side
of identical elements, e.g. of identical compression springs
of not identical elements of the same category, e.g. combinations of not identical springs
with at least one element being redundant
the elements functioning only in case of emergency
the elements not functioning in case of emergency
forming a unitary piece with another element
Strength alteration by reinforcing, e.g. by applying ribs
Strength alteration by weakening, e.g. by applying grooves
Application of doors, windows, wings or fittings thereof
characterised by the type of wing
Doors disappearing in pockets of a wall, e.g. so-called pocket doors
Doors disappearing in pockets in the furniture body
for railway cars or mass transit vehicles
characterised by the type of wing
